pkgmetadata.longdescription: Description-----------![Linting and Static](https://github.com/carneirofc/devops-utils/actions/workflows/lint.yml/badge.svg)![Latest tag](https://img.shields.io/github/tag/carneirofc/devops-utils.svg?style=flat)[![Latest release](https://img.shields.io/github/release/carneirofc/devops-utils.svg?style=flat)](https://github.com/carneirofc/devops-utils/releases)[![PyPI version fury.io](https://badge.fury.io/py/devops-utils.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/devops-utils/)[![Read the Docs](https://readthedocs.org/projects/spack/badge/?version=latest)](https://carneirofc.github.io/devops-utils/)A set of utility scripts for DevOpsDevelopment packages are listed at [requirements-dev.txt](requirements-dev.txt) and runtime dependencies at [requirements.txt](requirements.txt).Author------Cl√°udio Ferreira Carneiro - carneirofc @ claudiofcarneiro@hotmail.comLicence-------devops-utils licenced under GPL v3.
